name: A-Loan in Space
description:
First place winner of Dundee and Angus Game Jam 2023.

Given the Theme of "Alone" we refused to be dark and gritty.

Youve taken out A Loan and now the Debt Collectors after you.  Collect shiny scrap and drop it off at the scrap yard to pay off your loan!

Built by Jack jefferson, Innes Warwick, Fara Martins and Cal Russell
